title: Cranston SALE PENDING         White 32.99        Or possibly less
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Cranston SALE PENDING         White 32.99        Or possibly less
posts.post_content:
a second baseman from Memphis in PSA 2 condition for $ALE PENDING shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/33541/cranston-sl[/IMG]

or buy a Jack White from Buffalo in BVG 3.5 condition for $32.99 shipped.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10230/white-j[/IMG]

or take them both for $99 shipped.  Do the math.  WOW!!!!

The cards actually look better or worse than they appear in the scans.

If you can find these two cards for sale in this condition fo less, buy them.

Friendly bumps gladly accepted, even from ullman.:D
I'll take the Postage if still available.  It's his portrait, correct?

[quote name="t206fix" post=1681172]I'll take the Postage if still available.  It's his portrait, correct?[/QUOTE]

Postage does not have a clean back Tony.  Still interested?

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1681104]If you can find these two cards for sale in this condition fo less, buy them.

Friendly bumps gladly accepted, even from ullman.:D[/QUOTE]

If Pete bumps another T206 thread I'm reporting him to Leon!!!
I am extremely impressed at the match between the background and the Cranston.  Is this purchase open to hare flippers?

We go to great lengths to provide the most pleasing background color for our collaged scans.  Be mindful though that the Cranston background is not included in the sales price.  Absent deceit and collusion, hare flippers are more than welcome for one or both cards.  Seller's remorse is not part of my DNA.

To paraphrase Johnny Cochran

"If you're a hare, I don't care"

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1681286]
To paraphrase Johnny Cochran

"If you're a hare, I don't care"[/QUOTE]

Apropos of nothing, but that reminds me of the greatest billboard that I've ever seen...
Steve, that's a classic!   :D
Great ad.  I imagine Larry had, or has, a large appetite for controversy.

To paraphrase Larry L. Archie

"Just because you didn't do it, you may be guilty of thread neglect."

That's right, Cranston and White are still available.

Buy the card, not the holder or buy the holder, not the card.

Hold it, flip it, crack it, cross it over.

"Have it your way, hold the lettuce, but don't forget us."

This is the customary three day bump.;)

Doc -

There was a safe arrival of Postage (portrait).  Thanks for the amazing deal.  I know some guys on this thread hate it when you bump a thread... but your PM made it crystal clear that I needed to bump this thread (or you'd "torch my reputable reputation"). 
 
Weren't you classmates with Postage?

Your buddy,

Tony
